title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.1 - Representation by counsel permitted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.1 - Representation by counsel permitted

State Regulations

An applicant for a license or permit or the holder of a
license or permit under the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law may be represented
by counsel provided the attorney shall be a member of the Bar of the State of

New York in good standing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
80.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
